text: Nancy Elizabeth Lee Johnson (born January 5, 1935) is an American politician. Johnson was a Republican member of the United States House of Representatives from 1983 to 2007.Nancy Johnson , Baker, Donelson, Bearman, Caldwell & Berkowitz PC, Washington, DC. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Connecticut Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Nancy Johnson
